title: Here's a list of 20 articles on end-to-end speech translation up to 2021. These articles cover various aspects of the field, including models, techniques, and applications
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with the Transformer"** - Bérard et al
**"Speech Translation and the End-to-End Promise: Taking Stock of Where We Are"**
**"Direct Speech-to-Text Translation with a Sequence-to-Sequence Model"** - Weiss et al
**"End-to-End Speech Translation Without Speech Recognition"** - Jia et al
**"A Comparative Study on End-to-End Speech to Text Translation"**
**"Jointly Learning to Align and Translate with Transformer Models"** - Sperber et al
**"Improving Direct Speech Translation with Pre-trained Models and Monolingual Data"**
**"Incorporating Prosody into End-to-End Speech Translation"** - Kano et al
**"Self-Supervised Learning for End-to-End Speech Translation"** - Liu et al
**"Adapting Transformer for End-to-End Speech Translation"** - Di Gangi et al
**"Speech Translation with Transformer and Multi-Task Learning"** - Bahar et al
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Knowledge Distillation"** - Liu et al
**"Towards End-to-End Speech-to-Text Translation"** - Bérard et al
**"Speech Translation with Bilingual Speech Recognition"** - Anastasopoulos et al
**"Leveraging Pre-trained Language Models for End-to-End Speech Translation"**
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Transducer Models"** - Zhang et al
**"Multilingual End-to-End Speech Translation"** - Di Gangi et al
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Cross-Lingual Transfer"** - Liu et al
**"Direct Speech Translation with Target Language Modeling"** - Bahar et al
**"End-to-End Speech Translation with Pre-trained Encoders"** - Di Gangi et al
These articles should provide a comprehensive overview of the state-of-the-art in end-to-end speech translation up to
